website_summaries.verdict: A moderately-priced flask with a great look, this option should be thoroughly cleaned before use to remove the strong manufacturing odor.
pros: Nice leathery look with an understated American flag design
Comes with a funnel and lifetime guarantee
cons: American flag flask made in China may be a turn-off for some
Leather is very thin and seems cheap
Has a strong chemical smell right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flask
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was wanting for those dreaded 6 year old birthday partys my wife drags me to. It holds just enough whiskey to put a smile on my face and say inappropriate things while the kid hits the donkey pinata with his rubber bat. Feeling the American Flag through the leather reminds me that I am free and I am here by choice. Also I'm too drunk to drive home.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Stays sealed
customer_reviews.text: Fits well into my cargo pants pocket, and remains water tight no matter whether it’s right side up. Also, no metallic taste was imparted to the bourbon within
customer_reviews.author: Ed Tanous

customer_reviews.title: Free collapsible shot glass? AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man where do I begin! This is amazing. It looks soo nice and fancy it feels wonderful fits well in a back pocket. This is a great Christmas gift for my soldier! Also, they sent me a card with my purchase to get a free collapsible shot glass to go with it, what an awesome heartfelt company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a nice box which is totally giftable. I got this for my bf and he LOVES it. the leather cover feels soft and high quality. great product
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Found
customer_reviews.text: I really like to looks and functionality of this flask. It fitts the contour of my back pocket and my fishing vest. Looks very nice and would make a very nice gift. It come in a very nice unmarked gift box and is presented very nicely when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Just George

customer_reviews.title: The product came in secure packaging and was in perfect physical condition
customer_reviews.text: The product came in secure packaging and was in perfect physical condition. The flag emblem however was a little tilted but nothing a glance would notice so no stars taken off in that respect. The biggest thing I will say is that one cannot leave alcohol in the flask for extended periods of time because it will develop a metallic tinge in the taste, which is not a problem with the flask, it's a problem with metal itself.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product was better than I expected. I have owned other more expensive flasks. This one is easily the best. It comes with a funnel, which says volumes about the seller. They even included an extra gift, which will prove very useful. Of course I was concerned about the cap seal prior to it's arrival. The seller promises a good seal and it has a very seal. I fancy myself a minimalist. I have very little. What I have needs to be good. This product good.
customer_reviews.author: jon fisher

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Got it for my fiancè for Christmas but accidently pushed the order button twice so now we have matching flasks lol! Has nice feel in hand and the screw top doesn't get stuck like some cheaper ones do. Also love the box it came in, makes it perfect for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Orsingher

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Looks well built! Love the American Flag design! Fits perfect in my Cut! (leather biker vest)
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible leaky lid flask
customer_reviews.text: I’m really bummed as I thought this thing was sweet and a good deal. Problem is both times I’ve used it it’s leaked bad. There’s no rubber seal which means if it’s not perfectly straight up and down at all times.. you’re going to smell like alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nagelmann

customer_reviews.title: Flag upside down
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this cool flask w/the American Flag on it, but I was disappointed when I saw that they wrapped the leather w/the flag upside down... (this is the symbol for distress). I knew prior that is product was not American made but at least look at the product to see there’s an error on it, but I may be asking for too much... Anyway I requested an exchange since the product is still a solid buy so I’m hoping it was just a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It didn't seem like there was
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, but I opened it in order to see if there were any off putting odors or leftover manufacturing grease/oil. It didn't seem like there was. Pretty solid construction for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wil

customer_reviews.title: Great flask
customer_reviews.text: This flask is easy to use, keeps things clean, and is great to look at... I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Betty A Neumann

customer_reviews.title: 👀 cool
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but looks nice well built. Going to the mountains this weekend will try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: My flask leaks. If I tighten the cap enough, the ring that prevents the cap from being lost gets jammed and the cap can't be loosened (I needed a pair of pliers to loosen it). If I don't tighten it that much, it leaks. It's a shame, as the flask is quite nice other wise, and perhaps I just got a lemon. But I'm tossing mine after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this American Flag flask as a thank you gift for our neighbor. Filled it with his favorite drink. He absolutely loved it! GREAT product!!! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flask!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this flask! The quality is much better than expected! Makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Potter

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. The precipitant loved it and I find the funnel extremely useful as it's not the easiest to poor whiskey straight from the bottle into the flask
customer_reviews.author: EricTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: American Flag stitching!
customer_reviews.text: Great item to put in our "bug-out" bag. Makes a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: carcarzoom

customer_reviews.title: Classy touch of patriotism
customer_reviews.text: Great quality feel to it. The funnel cap did not quite fit inside the fitted foam insert for it, but that doesn't take away from its purpose as that is just packaging. No better way to show some patriotism with a touch of class.
customer_reviews.author: Smithfam6

customer_reviews.title: It had a slightly funny smell when it first arrived
customer_reviews.text: It had a slightly funny smell when it first arrived, so I soaked the interior with dish soap for a few days. The smell inside was gone after that. Sharp looking flask. I like the black flask because the American flag comes out discreetly yet sharp
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice and fits in my pocket as it should. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Missing funnel
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I was not afforded a funnel. Doesn’t leak that I noticed yet. But a decent product for what I paid for. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoalcraft

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice / works great
customer_reviews.text: We loved it so much we bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Berlepsch

customer_reviews.title: Moldy and mildewed. Disgusting! Not worth even 1 star.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product wrapped in cellophane that was seeping mold and mildew as part of a multi shipment package that, in turn, made everything else in this shipment smell like mold and mildew. I will be refunded for the cost of the item but I am taking a loss on everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved it just wish the cap wasnt so cheap. And the funnel could stay connected some how
customer_reviews.author: Auja Plaster

customer_reviews.title: Cool Flask and I really love the Flag on it
customer_reviews.text: Cool Flask and I really love the Flag on it. The only downside was the leather has a really wierd smell to it that doesnt quite smell right. Ive tried washing it but it hasnt quite gone away. This could just be how they treat it but I dont know
customer_reviews.author: insanity

customer_reviews.title: Great little flask
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Seems durable. Comes with a small funnel which is great
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship and comes with a little funnel for filling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Comes individually boxed and is great for gift giving. Serves well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: K Evans

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. I don’t know if I should keep or gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Endhir Esteban

customer_reviews.title: It does everything a flask should do plus it looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything a flask should do plus it looks cool. It's faux leather if that's going to bother you, and the flaps overlap together in the back and feel like they might catch on something and peel off since they're glued down and not sewn together.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Flask is just as described. Timely delivery and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little cheap, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No oily residues, no discoloration of my drink of choice. Feels sturdy in my hand, looks great, and comes with a small funnel to refill without spills.
customer_reviews.author: D Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great 21st Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Very classy! My nephew loved it. The Flag is a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Valentines Day gift for my boyfriend! Can’t wait to give it to him in a few weeks. Product looks great! Good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Reed

customer_reviews.title: Nice find
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and a perfect gift. We use it all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The leather gives it a nice look and doesn't leak. Seems to be quality product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Applequist

customer_reviews.title: My first flask and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great flask, now I can take my contraband booze in a more convenient and delicate way to wherever I want, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rigelly69

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Gives my bourbon a weird taste. It will work in a pinch if you just gotta have your booze I guess.
customer_reviews.author: tom robbins

customer_reviews.title: Received the flask very fast! Needed it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the flask very fast! Needed it for a party that had a cash bar. Flask saved the night, it fit perfectly in my suit jacket's inside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Raybgd

customer_reviews.title: Trash!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No idea how this trash got good reviews. Flag is printed upside down half the thread is falling out and the cap broke off the first time we un screwed it. Terrible product

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described! We bought this as a gift for one of our groomsmen and he will love it! Very large and great price!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flask
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what it get. It is t super high quality leather but hey, it’s a nice flask for under $20

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great quality flask. Comes in a box perfect for gifting. Would recommend!

customer_reviews.title: nice quality flask
customer_reviews.text: nice quality flask. rinsed it out with water before using, but first fill of scotch was contaminated with gray residue. had to rinse several times before it ran clear.
customer_reviews.author: Don McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! I bought this as a gift and was happy it even came in a gift box. It’s exactly what I’d hoped for, quick shipping, and they even sent a follow up email to make sure I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Great detail! Easy to fill and easy to drink!

customer_reviews.title: Nice flask!
customer_reviews.text: It came well packaged, no damage, Although my husband hasn’t used yet, it seems worth the price. He really liked the design on it.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need for Golf with the buddies.
customer_reviews.text: Every time we get a birdie out pops the flask. Fits perfect in the golf bag and stays cold for the entire round.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Came it a really nice box. Also includes funnel piece for easy fill up. Great quality for a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It holds booze, which is great. Seals well. Tiny funnel kinda sucks, but its actually made of metal and not plastic!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected

customer_reviews.text: If you love whiskey as much as I love America, this is the flask for you.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I thought this may be too small or not very tough....I am pleased that it is durable so far and has held up well and continues to perform well. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good value.

customer_reviews.text: Works great. I cleaned it out with soap and warm water when I received and have had no issues with taste.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flask

customer_reviews.title: Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Great flask, fantastic customer service

product_meta.title: OUTZIE American Flag Flask - Soft Touch Cover | Laser Welded | 18/8 304 Food Grade Stainless Steel | Leak Proof Slim Profile Classic American Flag Design | Funnel and Gift Box Included
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:8oz

New Classic Design Stainless Steel Hip Flask with Full One Year Warranty - High Quality Superior Construction by OUTZIE Brand Outdoor Products

High Quality Construction

 - Stainless Steel Construction 
- Classic Faux Leather Cover 
- High Quality Metal Cap with Secure Seal – No Leaks 
- Curve Shape for Comfortable Fit in Your Pocket or Purse 
- Includes Lifetime Guarantee from Manufacturer

Ideal Container for All Your Outdoor Activities

Enjoy your favorite spirit or beverage on your next outdoor activity. Ideal for Tailgating before the big game, golfing with your buddies, fishing, hiking, camping, etc. This classic stainless steel flask with faux leather outer cover is the perfect container for every occasion. Classic American Flag design. The superior construction ensures a secure fit of the cap to the body and no leaks even after repeated use.

 Your search for the Best Stainless Steel Hip Flask has ended. Look no further! You will always be ready for the sip to warm you up with the OUTZIE brand flask.

 

Lifetime Guarantee from Manufacturer with Full Refund if Not Satisfied

Order Now

AMERICAN FLAG DESIGN - with Leather Outer Cover that looks great at any event.
LIGHTWEIGHT - will fit in your pocket discreetly with a slim contour shape. Great gift idea. USA
IDEAL for all outdoor activities. Take if Camping, Fishing, Boating, Hiking, Tailgating, to the Game, etc. Never leave your favorite Spirit behind. Patriotic Design
Great Gift | GUARANTEE -FULL WARRANTY - No Risk money back guarantee. Return for full refund if not satisfied.
